channel.title: EZScanner
channel.description:
[center] [b][i]Introduction[/i][/b] Have you ever lost a text file located deep within you're computer, and you only remember a few small words that it contained? Well you're in luck, I'm currently developing a simple yet useful bit of software to scan you're computer's files for pretty much everything! Of course, at the moment the program is in a bare bone state. I maybe worked on it around 30 minutes total on and off since last night. So its functionality is limited. As you would guess at the moment you are able to search for all the files in a specified directory, search for a certain extension, and even search for specified text in every file in that particular drive! I expect to update the program on a daily basis to add new functionality to it, i even plan on allow you to play Mp3 & other media files straight from the program. In the further future i will allow you to share files with friends and even backup files on a specialized server i am currently building! Let me note that these are just ideas, and the program is still in a very early stage within development. I hope to have a nice stable version out within a month. But you can download a small preview of the program below, and even view some screenshots below that.
[b][i]Download:[/i][/b] http://www.deviconcreations.com/download.php
[img]http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/files/imagehost/pics/70722fa4eb26f994253738e2fefb6da1.png[/img] [img]http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/files/imagehost/pics/05fb0f6b654314eb63b574c6b8981da7.png[/img] [img]http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/files/imagehost/pics/18e27a94eab84686a1293a85b672ff24.png[/img] [img]http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/files/imagehost/pics/c023c7953ef15b68380db4b463bab533.png[/img] [img]http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/files/imagehost/pics/1ba49566f51a7fed8e2f6998219c1a3f.png[/img]
Thank You For You're Time, General Pony.

item.title: EZScanner
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“General Pony, post:29, topic:451298”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=554189.msg4059115#msg4059115 date=1343266079]
Welcome, General. I’d like to see some work you can actually come up with.
[/quote]

I might of attempted to show of future projects i work on if the community didn’t show a full on blast of ignorance in two pages.

A great way to welcome someone that is new to the forums. I can understand giving a opinion on the crappy UI, and the limited and useless features. But damn, it was a small project i pulled together whilst i was bored, at first i was actually going to give it the functionality to compare file signatures to the extensions, but i dropped that when i realized it would be 10x more efficient in C++.

I’m really not going to let anyone get to me on this matter, its rather silly about how they took it to such a extreme level.

A good start would be to go open source so people can give you response to your code, there are actually quite a few knowledgeable people here.

You are basing my intelligence in programming upon a crappy piece of software that i once again wrote in 30 minutes? I doubt i can learn anything more then poor programming methods from anyone on here, i have other people who are actually CS grads rather then a bunch of low lives on here.[/quote]And on that note I’ll lock this, with a few final notes.

  1. Look up what ignorance means.
    2.[quote=“Davidi2, post:28, topic:451298”]General Pony, on this site, you have to learn that the people here can be helpful and give good criticism, but ONLY if you show willingness to learn. Being egotistical about your program and denying that it has faults wont get you anywhere here. A lot of us have to learn that the hard way just like you.

A good start would be to go open source so people can give you response to your code, there are actually quite a few knowledgeable people here.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: EZScanner
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

[quote=“General Pony, post:13, topic:451298”][quote author=Phillipé link=topic=554189.msg4059060#msg4059060 date=1343264713]

I knew by coming to a forum with inexperienced users such as this, i would get typical idiotic feedback.

Inexperienced users? You’ve essentially slammed a GUI on a bog standard, below average file searching tool. Do you expect me to start foaming at the mouth at this awful excuse for a thread and piece of software?

Yeah because i can defiantly run multiple threads to handle indexing and searching line by line through text files without hanging the main application straight from the controls box.

Please kid, it was written in 30 minutes. What do you expect, Mona Lisa?

Instead of raving about how you wrote this in 30 minutes, why don’t you spend another 30 minutes attempting to not make it useless?

Why would I use this piece of shit when every os or distro can do exactly what this can do, and more. Or am I forgetting that you made it in 30 minutes again, like that’s relevant.
[/quote]

Ignorance, a great way to welcome someone who posted this as there first thread.

Now of course, i don’t need to waste my time here any further. I found this sad excuse for a site (Nice default theme) and figured i would try and keep a few development type logs going. But of course as i figured coming to a site based upon not only poorly coded software, but also stolen from another company. I would find said ignorance.

You should really get you’re attitude fixed, you won’t make it long in the real world.

And going on the fact of why not improve this software right now?

Maybe i have other things I’m working on? On top of this being my 3rd month studying not only 1, but 4 different programming languages (C#, C++, Java, Vb.net) I’m also working on a small Rpg project based upon XNA framework. So i have a lot of time on my hands to argue with you all day over a tiny bit of software i came up with whilst i was bored on a train ride.[/quote]

Honesty, a great way to force you to pull your socks up and filter something a 9 year old could produce to a higher standard.

Oh, please waste your time on this sad excuse of a site (Maybe someone with such a higher intelligence such as yourself would figure to change the theme by the way). Keep your development logs going, of which each “Developed project” is one file consisting of 52 lines of useless code that when thrown together offers no real reason for anyone to use it. Oh, also I’d like to note that this site may be full of poorly written private servers derived off a game - but at least each user participating is actually trying to better their code overall.

My attitude is fine, it’s served me well so far in my life.

If you’re going to post something publicly so that people can give their honest opinion, personally I wouldn’t give it such a half arsed attitude (Maybe you should get that fixed?). Also, learning 4 different languages (Loosely classified vb.net as a language) doesn’t mean your opinion is solid and correct. You may be learning 4 languages, but from what I can see you might want to focus on one at a time.

Congratulations, you’re writing a small RPG - a lot of members from this useless site full of poorly written code did a little competition making games. How does that make you feel being on par with such “inferior people to yourself”.

fuck off already.

Read full topic

I thought this was just a shitty array of controls, what is there to show?[/quote]

Your ignorance is appalling…

Why would I use this piece of shit when every os or distro can do exactly what this can do, and more. Or am I forgetting that you made it in 30 minutes again, like that’s relevant.

item.title: EZScanner
item.dc:creator: @General_Pony General Pony
item.description:
@General_Pony wrote:
